issue.title: Model for left arm is wrong in v4 (and has always been wrong)

content.raw: The sign changes in the link origin poses and joint origin poses (except for shz), the off-axis inertia matrix changes, and the meshes are explained by copying the right arm properties to the left. We then found the joint axes pretty much experimentally (just checking on the real robot which direction was positive) after copying those properties over from right to left and adding the pi rotation offsets.
